DOC.brief_summary: This study investigate clinical efficacy safety epoetin beta 36,000 IU compare placebo administrate subcutaneously ( s.c. ) once-weekly 12 week anemic patient lung cancer gynecologic cancer undergo chemotherapy .
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Study Epoetin Beta Chemotherapy-Induced Anemia ( CIA ) Patients
DOC.criteria: Lung cancer gynecologic cancer patient Undergoing platinumbased chemotherapy repeat ≧ 2 cycle erythropoietin ( EPO ) placebo administration 8.0 g/dL ≦ hemoglobin concentration ( Hb ) ≦ 10.0 g/dL 20 79 year old Performance status : 0 2 No iron deficiency anemia Red blood cell transfusion within 4 week treatment Erythropoietin therapy within 8 week treatment
